# Data import

The university rank dataset is was copied from https://www.webometrics.info/en/distribution_by_country.

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
df_ranks <- read.csv('data/webometrics.tsv', sep = '\t')

# Set country rank based on row number
df_ranks$RANK <- 1:nrow(df_ranks)
```
